name: Code - RED
description:
Shoot the Red - Spikes to Save your Monochromatic World from the Dreadful Red World! You will have to endlessly survive the waves of Red Spikes Attacking your world, and You, being the savior, are supposed to kill all of them and help your world.

Controls:

  • A-D / Arrow Keys: To Move Around
  • Space Bar: Jump
  • S / Down Arrow: Fall off Platform
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Click: Shoot
  • Right: Shoot Grenade Bullets
  • E: Shoot Bullets but with Twist!
